short_summary: Call for Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) #20220786, titled
description: The purpose of this notice is to inform interested suppliers that the Canadian government intends to award a contract to the pre-identified supplier, Iron Mountain Canada, for warehouse storage and related services. The contract is for a period of up to two (2) years, with an option to extend for an additional two (2) years. The estimated value of the contract is between $250,000 and $500,000. The services required include warehouse storage and related services, such as transport and container retrieval, to ship out and return material to the project authority's defined delivery point.
